contexts.context: But if <mark>sorcerers</mark> bring them forth, then such a summons is...
...burning cannot cleanse the fault. Abide not the <mark>sorcerer</mark> among you, for he comes to steal the bones...
...the spirits of the Dunmer dead. Those foreign <mark>sorcerers</mark> of other races that invade our shores, shall...
...tombs, to bind our kin-spirits into <mark>sorcerous</mark> slavery, to steal the lives of our dead...
Tel Fyr is the Telvanni tower of <mark>Sorcerer</mark>-Lord Divayth Fyr. Beneath the tower is...
...Telvanni tower of Arch-Mage Gothren, Telvanni <mark>Sorcerer</mark>-Lord and head of the Telvanni Council....
